red_dir.comment: Path to field top-level data directory

field_name.comment: Name of the field to plot

quadrant.comment: Index of quadrant of data to plot

reference_dataset_code.comment: Identifier for the site/enclosure to be used as the photometry reference dataset, cannot be None [e.g. lsc_doma]

plot_i_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-i magnitudes to use for plots

i_sigma_max.comment: Maximum SDSS-i magnitude uncertainty to use for plots

plot_r_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-r magnitudes to use for plots

r_sigma_max.comment: Maximum SDSS-r magnitude uncertainty to use for plots

plot_g_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-g magnitudes to use for plots

g_sigma_max.comment: Maximum SDSS-g magnitude uncertainty to use for plots

plot_rms_range.comment: Minimum and maximum RMS in magnitude
